Developer Terms of Use
des:
Test your grasp over English Idioms by playing Mastering Idioms and ramp up their usage in regular conversations without hesitation. The game offers two challenges. Crack the idiom involves finding the meaning of the idiom in question. And Find the idiom is about identifying the idiom from the given meaning. There is also a lesson feature that helps beginners by providing a sneak-peek into idioms and their significance in language. Additionally, the “idiom of the day” feature allows users to learn the meaning of a new idiom each day and its usage in a sentence.

Once you’ve enabled this app on your Alexa device, just say “Alexa, open Mastering Idioms” and use the following commands: 

To choose a game level, say:
“Crack the idiom” or “Find the idiom”

To switch from one game level to another, say:
Change level

To get a lesson on idioms, ask:
“What are idioms?”

To understand the rules of the game, say “help”.

To erase your progress and start fresh, say:
“Reset the game”
